content: Factors that would cause or contribute to such difference include, but are not limited to, tourism and weather conditions in areas we serve; the impacts of COVID-19 pandemic, particularly on our retail and manufacturing segments; the economic, political and social conditions of each country in which we conduct or plan to conduct business; our relationship with the government entities and other customers we serve; matters regulatory, including resolution of negotiations for the renewal of our retail license in Grand Canyon -- excuse me, Grand Cayman; our ability to successfully enter new markets and other various risks, as detailed in the company's periodic report filings with the Securities and Exchange system.
